title: EEC: Regulation No 49 of the Council amending the date on which certain instruments relating to the common agricultural policy are to enter into force
header:
REGULATION No 49 OF THE COUNCIL amending the date on which certain instruments relating to the common agricultural policy are to enter into force
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC COMMUNITY
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1962.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 June 1962.
For the Council
The President
M. COUVE de MURVILLE
